name: Monsters Idle RPG
description:
Explore the world of Arcadius - a place filled with many types of mythical creatures - manage your creatures, items, capital, other resources and capture all creatures by battling in diverse biomes and places.


As you explore, you'll encounter and catch new monsters, each with their own unique abilities and personalities. And with a range of items and upgrades available, you can make your favorite monsters reach the ultimate level.


With just a few clicks, you can set your monsters to battle automatically, allowing you to sit back and enjoy the progression. And with the ability to earn rewards even when you're not actively playing, this game is perfect for busy players who want to enjoy a satisfying RPG experience without spending all their time glued to their screens.


Defeat and capture Epic Creatures


Collect all creatures of Arcadius





Features

  • ⚔️A Casual and Relaxing Idle RPG Game with hours of entertainment;;
  • ⚙️ A Satisfying progression system
  • 🏝️ Beautiful Graphics and Relaxing Ambience;
  • 🦊 Manage your team to battle and capture ever more creatures;
  • 🔨 Buy upgrades to get stronger and defeat all opponents;
  • 📦 Choose your creatures according to different demands;
  • ⛏️ Many items for you to discover and use;
  • 🎒 Fully interactive Crafting/Inventory System;
  • 🌟 Game content that continues to grow through expansions.

Thank you so much for your visit! I'm a solo indie game developer and I am doing my best to improve the game based on the community feedback. By purchasing the game you are encoraging me to keep making games even better. Best wishes!
